title: Suriname Jawa (2009) New Testament (Print) SABDA
description: Javanese is spoken throughout Indonesia, neighboring Southeast Asian countries, the Netherlands, Suriname, New Caledonia, and other countries. The largest populations of speakers are found in the six provinces of Java itself, and in the neighboring Sumatran province of Lampung.

language.name: Caribbean Javanese
language.area: Coastal area. Also in French Guiana.
